posts.post_title: N172 OJ Tom Loftus on Ebay
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Donald Johnson
Okay, I'm braindead, the card I have listed on ebay at [url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=5173393333[/url] is a card annotated by Buck Barker, not Jefferson Burdick [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG] .
